title: Monrjiall.Hello1
body:
Hello?

[[Mimir.Hello]]

title: Mimir.Hello
body:
Hello

[[Monrjiall.Head]]

title: Monrjiall.Head
body:
So… you are a head… but you can talk…

[[Mimir.correct]]

title: Mimir.correct
body:
That is correct, yes. 
The name is Mimir, by the way. 
A real pleasure, Mr..?

[[Monrjiall.name]]

title: Monrjiall.name
body:
[[I’m not telling you my name without knowing yours first!|Mimir.toldYou]]
[[Why would I tell you my name?|Mimir.why]]
[[Monrjiall, son of M’gsroell.|Mimir.meet]]

title: Mimir.toldYou
body:
But… I just told you my name… 
It’s Mimir, remember?

[[Monrjiall.Imember]]

title: Mimir.meet
body:
Well, nice to meet you, Monrjiall.

[[Monrjiall.headAgain]]

title: Mimir.why
body:
Why wouldn't you?

[[Monrjiall.reason]]

title: Monrjiall.Imember
body:
Oh... right...

[[Mimir.well]]

title: Mimir.well
body:
...
Well?

[[Monrjiall.wellWhat]]

title: Monrjiall.wellWhat
body:
Well what?

[[Mimir.name]]

title: Mimir.name
body:
Your name?

[[Monrjiall.nameAgain]]

title: Monrjiall.nameAgain
body:
Right! Monrjiall is my name. 
But you can call me Monrjiall.

[[Mimir.remember]]

title: Mimir.remember
body:
...I’ll make sure I remember that...

[[Monrjiall.headAgain]]

title: Monrjiall.reason
body:
You might be an enemy, or someone dangerous.

[[Mimir.head]]

title: Mimir.head
body:
I’m a bodiless head. 
The worst I could do is bite you relatively hard if you came close enough... 
And I don’t need your name for that.

[[Monrjiall.safe]]

title: Monrjiall.safe
body:
Oh, right… Monrjiall is my name, then.

[[Monrjiall.headAgain]]

title: Monrjiall.headAgain
body:
Why are you only a head? Where is the rest of your body?

[[Mimir.sadStory]]

title: Mimir.sadStory
body:
Ah, that is a sad story, indeed. 
Would you like to hear it?

[[Monrjiall.long]]

title: Monrjiall.long
body:
Is it long?

[[Mimir.long]]

title: Mimir.long
body:
Oh, yes, very. Long and full of sorrow and betrayal.

[[Monrjiall.no]]

title: Monrjiall.no
body:
Oh… no, then, I would not like to hear it.

[[Mimir.short]]

title: Mimir.short
body:
I’ll give you the short version then. 
I was a guest to the Vanir gods once. 
However, their mistrust led them to try and kill me. 
They beheaded me and sent my head back to Odin. 
Odin valued my wisdom and advice too much to let me die... 
So he used magic to keep my head alive.

[[Monrjiall.longIndeed]]

title: Monrjiall.longIndeed
body:
That was rather long for a short version.

<<if not visited ("Mimir.sometimes")>>
[[Do you give fashion advice to Odin?|Mimir.sometimes]]
<<endif>>
<<if not visited ("Mimir.mission")>>
[[If Odin values you so much, how come you are here in Midgard, half-buried in snow and surrounded by dead bodies?|Mimir.mission]]
<<endif>>
[[If you are so wise, maybe you can help me on my quest|Mimir.god]]

title: Mimir.sometimes
body:
Sometimes, yes. 
He’s rather self-conscious about his looks.

[[Monrjiall.fashion]]

title: Monrjiall.fashion
body:
Would you give me advice on what to wear?

[[Mimir.horns]]

title: Mimir.horns
body:
You can start by removing those horns from your head. 
Who wears that?

[[Monrjiall.longIndeed]]

title: Mimir.mission
body:
Umm, yes… don’t tell anyone... 
But he sent me on a secret mission.

[[Monrjiall.wow]]

title: Monrjiall.wow
body:
Wow! Really?? 
What is it?

[[Mimir.goodQuestion]]

title: Mimir.goodQuestion
body:
Yes, what is it, good question...
Unfortunately, I cannot tell you.
It's top secret.

[[Monrjiall.ofCourse]]

title: Monrjiall.legs
body:
Right. Right. 
And how do you complete this mission without any legs? 
Or arms? 
Or body at all?

[[Mimir.confess]]

title: Mimir.suppose
body:
I can't tell you that, either, I suppose.

[[Monrjiall.legs]]

title: Monrjiall.ofCourse
body:
Of course. 
But where do you have to go for this mission?

[[Mimir.suppose]]

title: Mimir.confess
body:
Alright, fine! You caught me! 
Odin gets drunk from time to time and likes throwing me around. 
Sometimes it gets out of hand and I end up being hurled through Yggdrasil to other worlds. 
That’s how I ended up here, in this particular occasion.

[[Monrjiall.understand]]

title: Monrjiall.understand
body:
I still don’t understand how you are going to complete the mission.

[[Mimir.wow]]

title: Mimir.wow
body:
Wow… just.. wow...

[[Monrjiall.longIndeed]]

title: Mimir.god
body:
I am a God of Wisdom. 
It would be unseemly for me to favor a single human from Midgard.

[[Monrjiall.asgard]]

title: Monrjiall.asgard
body:
I have matters to attend to with Odin and the rest of the Gods. 
My ultimate goal would take me into Asgard itself.

[[Mimir.convenient]]

title: Mimir.convenient
body:
That WOULD seem convenient for my current predicament. 
Still, I should not take part in human affairs without Odin’s consent… 
Unless...

[[Monrjiall.unless]]

title: Monrjiall.unless
body:
Unless what?

[[Mimir.worthy]]

title: Mimir.worthy
body:
Unless said human was worthy of my wisdom... 
Excelling in knowledge, logic thinking and observation skills.

[[Monrjiall.five]]

title: Monrjiall.five
body:
HA! Five of my finest attributes!

[[Monrjiall.trials]]

title: Monrjiall.trials
body:
<<if not visited ("Mimir.trial1")>>
[[How can I prove my knowledge wothy...er...est..ness? |Mimir.trial1]]
<<elseif visited ("Mimir.trial1") and $HoenirKnown is false>>
[[Can you repeat the knowledge question? |Mimir.trial1repeat]]
<<elseif visited ("Mimir.trial1") and $HoenirKnown is true and not visited ("Mimir.trial1complete")>>
[[Hello, Mimir… or should I say HOENIR! |Mimir.trial1complete]]
<<endif>>

[[LOGIC THINKING PUZZLE |Mimir.trial2]]

<<if not visited ("Mimir.trial3")>>
[[My sight is impeccable, what is it you want me to observe? |Mimir.trial3]]
<<elseif visited ("Mimir.trial3") and $ItemObserved is false>>
[[What is it I’m looking for? |Mimir.trial3repeat]]
<<elseif visited ("Mimir.trial3") and $ItemObserved is true and not visited ("Mimir.trial3complete")>>
[[Did you see that [ITEM]? That’s not something you see everyday on a battlefield, is it? |Mimir.trial3complete]]
<<endif>>

[[I'll be right back|Mimir.Exit]]

title: Monrjiall.Hello
body:
<<if not visited ("Monrjiall.Hello1")>>
[[Monrjiall.trials]]
<<else>>
[[Monrjiall.trials]]
<<endif>>

title: Mimir.trial1
body:
Off to a great start there, my friend. 
Anyway, any scholar worth his salt should have the basic lore regarding his Gods history. 
Before I was killed, I lived for a while with the Vanir Gods, along with another Aesir God such as myself. 
You have to name that God to prove your knowledge.
[[Monrjiall.silence]]

title: Mimir.trial2
body:
Answer 2

[[Monrjiall.trials]]

title: Mimir.trial3
body:
Something in this field clearly doesn’t belong... 
and was probably introduced by Odin, they same way I arrived.

[[Monrjiall.Finger]]

title: Mimir.trial1repeat
body:
Who was with me as a guest to the Vanir Gods?

[[Monrjiall.RightEasy]]

title: Mimir.trial1complete
body:
No, you should not, but that IS the right answer. Hoenir was the other God the Vanir hosted along with me. Good job!

[[Monrjiall.OtherGod]]

title: Monrjiall.silence
body:
....

[[Mimir.Monrjiall?]]

title: Mimir.Monrjiall?
body:
Monrjiall?

[[Monrjiall.DoneTalking]]

title: Monrjiall.DoneTalking
body:
Oh, yes, you are done talking.

[[Mimir.answer?]]

title: Mimir.answer?
body:
Yes, do you know the answer?

[[Monrjiall.AnswerGoThere]]

title: Monrjiall.AnswerGoThere
body:
Of course, everybody knows that… I just need to… um… check something first.

[[Monrjiall.trials]]

title: Monrjiall.RightEasy
body:
Right, easy. I’ll be right back.

[[Monrjiall.trials]]

title: Monrjiall.OtherGod
body:
What other God?

[[Monrjiall.trials]]

title: Mimir.Exit
body: Of course, I'm not going anywhere anytime soon.

title: Monrjiall.finger
body:
That’s easy. 
The giant finger that keeps appearing near me every few seconds.

[[Mimir.What?]]

title: Mimir.What?
body:
What?

[[Monrjiall.What?]]

title: Monrjiall.What?
body:
What?

[[Mimir.WhatFinger]]

title: Mimir.WhatFinger
body:
What giant finger?

[[Monrjiall.Where?]]

title: Monrjiall.Where?
body:
A giant finger? Where?

[[Mimir.YouGiantFinger]]

title: Mimir.YouGiantFinger
body:
You just said there was a giant finger!

[[Monrjiall.Nonsense]]

title: Monrjiall.Nonsense
body:
I said no such thing! That’s nonsense!

[[Mimir.Nevermind]]

title: Mimir.Nevermind
body:
But… nevermind, search for something that does not belong and tell me what it is.

[[Monrjiall.OtherFinger]]

title: Monrjiall.OtherFinger
body:
Other than the giant finger then, got it!

[[Mimir.sigh]]

title: Mimir.sigh
body:
*sigh*

[[Monrjiall.trials]]

title: Mimir.trial3repeat
body:
Something that clearly does not belong in this world, the same as me.

[[Monrjiall.SawSomething]]

title: Monrjiall.SawSomething
body:
Yes, I think I saw something.

[[Monrjiall.trials]]

title: Mimir.trial3complete
body:
That is it! Very observant of you. Well done!

[[Monrjiall.thanks]]

title: Monrjiall.thanks
body:
Thank you! 
That is what?

[[Monrjiall.trials]]
